text:
Care of the asthmatic oral and maxillofacial surgery patient.
 It is estimated that asthma affects 6 to 9 million people in the United States.
 The nature of this disease makes it a special concern to the oral and maxillofacial surgeon.
 Appropriate management of the asthmatic patient with regard to anesthesia and surgical procedures of the oral and maxillofacial region is discussed.
